summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5436 for the improvement of 30th Avenue West, from West Ray Street to a point 200 feet, more or less, north of West Armour Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 68343, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
